{{refimprove|date=July 2010}} {{Infobox company | name = Coherent Solutions | logo = [[Image:Coherent Solutions logo.png]] | type = Privately held company | foundation = 1995 | location_city = [[Minneapolis, MN]] | location_country = [[USA]] | key_people = [http://www.tcbmag.com/peoplecompanies/businessleaders/86846p1.aspx Igor Epshteyn], CEO | industry = Software development
[[Software testing]]
[[Software maintenance]] & support
[[IT consulting]]
[[Web development]] | revenue = $6M USD (2007) | num_employees = 175 (2007) | homepage = [http://www.coherentsolutions.com/ www.coherentsolutions.com] }} '''Coherent Solutions'''[http://www.startribune.com/business/103737919.html Coherent Solutions company profile] at ''[[Star Tribune]]'' is a [[software development]] [[outsourcing]] company with headquarters in [[Minneapolis, MN]], and an offshore development office in [[Minsk, Belarus]]. The company provides software development services with a focus on Microsoft, Java and other technologies for Web, Mobile, and Integration solutions.{{cite news| url=http://www.bizjournals.com/twincities/print-edition/2011/01/07/offshore-assistant-role-proves-fruitful.html|title=For Coherent Solutions, offshore-assistant role proves fruitful|work=Minneapolis / St. Paul Business Journal|publisher=bizjournals.com|first=Brent|last=Renneke|date=7 January 2011}} Since 2006{{cite news| url=http://www.prweb.com/releases/2010/06/prweb4180224.htm|title=Coherent Solutions Renews Gold Certified Partner Status in Microsoft Partner Program for Fifth Consecutive Year|work=[[PRWeb]] |publisher=prweb.com}} Coherent Solutions has been a [[Microsoft Gold Certified Partner]].[http://solutionfinder.microsoft.com/Partners/PartnerDetailsView.aspx?partnerid=a545cae3ce7e43568c3a56403dc1b0fb Microsoft Gold Certified Partner profile] at ''[[Microsoft]]'' Coherent Solutions was founded in 1995 in Minneapolis, MN by Igor Epshteyn.{{cite news| url=http://www.tcbmag.com/peoplecompanies/businessleaders/86846p1.aspx|title=What We Came For|work=Twin Cities Business|publisher=tcbmag.com}} In 2003 he established a development center in Minsk, Belarus. Coherent's Minneapolis office is responsible for sales, account management, and front-end consulting onsite with its customers. The companyâs Minsk office performs software design, development, testing, and maintenance.{{cite news| url=http://www.startribune.com/business/103737799.html|title=Offshore Link Helps Software Developer|work=[[Star Tribune]]|publisher=startribune.com}} In Minsk Coherent Solutions operates under the name 'Issoft Solutions'. In 2007 the company became a member of [[Belarus High Technologies Park]].{{cite news| url=http://www.park.by/it/enterprise-107/|title=The residents of the Belarus High Technologies Park|work=[[Belarus High Technologies Park]] |publisher=park.by}} == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.coherentsolutions.com/ Coherent Solutions website] * [http://www.issoft.by/ Issoft Solutions website] [[Category:Software companies based in Minnesota]] [[Category:Software companies of Belarus]] [[Category:Companies based in Minnesota]] [[Category:Companies established in 1995]] [[Category:Privately held companies based in Minnesota]]
